root.name: Root
root.description: The wrapper component that provides context for the tooltip.

prop.name: defaultOpen
prop.info_tooltips: Whether the tooltip is open by default.

prop.name: open
prop.info_tooltips: Controlled open state of the tooltip.

prop.name: onOpenChange
prop.info_tooltips: Callback called when open state changes.

prop.name: delayDuration
prop.info_tooltips: Duration from when the mouse enters the trigger until the tooltip opens.

trigger.name: Trigger
trigger.description: The element that triggers the tooltip. Must be an interactive element.

prop.name: asChild
prop.info_tooltips: When true, tooltip will be rendered in the DOM as the child component of the trigger element rather than as a sibling.

content.name: Content
content.description: The content displayed inside the tooltip.

prop.name: side
prop.info_tooltips: The preferred side of the trigger to render against.

prop.name: sideOffset
prop.info_tooltips: The distance in pixels from the trigger.

prop.name: align
prop.info_tooltips: The preferred alignment against the trigger.

prop.name: alignOffset
prop.info_tooltips: An offset in pixels from the edge of the boundary.

prop.name: avoidCollisions
prop.info_tooltips: When true, overrides the side and align preferences to prevent collisions with boundary edges.

prop.name: className
prop.info_tooltips: Additional CSS class name for styling.

data.description:
<Text>
                Moves focus to the trigger element.
            </Text>

<Text>
                When focus is on the trigger, toggles the tooltip.
            </Text>

<Text>
                When focus is on the trigger, toggles the tooltip.
            </Text>
